lead_paragraph: Dan Haren was dominant over seven shutout innings, limiting Boston to two hits and outpitching Josh Beckett in the Arizona Diamondbacks’ 2-1 victory over the host Red Sox on Monday night.
snippet: Dan Haren was dominant over seven shutout innings, limiting Boston to two hits and outpitching Josh Beckett in the Arizona Diamondbacks’ 2-1 victory over the host Red Sox on Monday night.
